name: Volbeat
description: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.  This ability has no effect in battle.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its bug-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is increased.
abilities.description: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Prankster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one stage.
abilities.description: Gives priority to a status move.
